permissions: Admins can update material suppliers. Non-admins can update if they are members of the supplier's broker or are manager members of the material supplier.
side_effects: Updates material supplier attributes. If name changes, the server updates material transaction tonnage summaries asynchronously.
validation_notes: At least one attribute flag is required. name is validated for presence when changed. url must be a valid URL when provided. phone-number must pass server phone number validation when provided. --active sets is_active true; --no-active sets is_active false. --is-controlled-by-broker sets is_controlled_by_broker true; --no-is-controlled-by-broker sets it false.

flags.name: --phone-number
flags.validation: must be a valid phone number

flags.name: --no-is-controlled-by-broker
flags.description: Supplier is not controlled by broker
